    • Uses of Document in com.guardtime.envelope.document

      Subinterfaces of Document in com.guardtime.envelope.document 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  UnknownDocument
      For representing any data in an Envelope that is not associated with any SignatureContent.
      Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.document that implement Document 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EmptyDocument
      Represents a document in a envelope which doesn't store the document data in the same envelope (detached document).
      class  SignedDocument
      Wrapper for a Document which creates a backward link to the SignatureContent that contains the Document and that provides the EnvelopeSignature for the document.
